description: This file initializes an agent that uses Cartesia tools for text-to-speech synthesis, runs a greeting generation, and saves the resulting audio to a file.

methods.name: Agent
methods.description: Constructor for creating an agent that can perform tasks using specified tools.

methods.name: CartesiaTools
methods.description: Provides tools for interacting with the Cartesia API for speech synthesis.

methods.name: write_audio_to_file
methods.description: Saves audio data to a specified file.
